vsParam:
Look carefully at the top left.
There are two categories, [c][DF1FB2FF]Manual[-][/c] and [c][009C8CFF]Auto[-][/c].

①[c][DF1FB2FF]Manual[-][/c] Items can be
　[c][DF1FB2FF]used freely in battles[-][/c].

②In battle, there is a chance that [c][009C8CFF]auto items[-][/c] will be activated only when
[c][009C8CFF]characters who have auto item ability are present[-][/c].

For now, equip an item in the [c][DF1FB2FF]Manual slot[-][/c].
[c][DF1FB2FF]You can use it at any time during battle[-][/c].
First, tap on the empty item slot.
